txt.en: Iivari is at Rusfold.\n\nYou should bring the recovered weapons to Iivari.
The two Earth-kin clans in the North Downs have begun to find themselves at war with one another. The peaceful Suuri-lehmä are now at odds with the war-mongering Rauta-lehmä.

'We have lost much with our brethren's betrayal. They took from us. They stole from us.\n\n'The Earth-kin of the Rauta-lehmä take weapons from the fallen. Go there and take these weapons back. They belong to us.'
The stolen weapons may be found on hostile Rauta-lehmä Earth-kin in Nan Amlug, east of Rusfold.\n\nYou should recover stolen weapons from the hostile Earth-kin, and return them to Iivari at Rusfold.
'You give heart to the Earth-kin, to return these to us. Thank you, small creature. We are allies.'
'You must recover the weapons from our enemies.'
Return the Earth-kin Weapons to Iivari
Return the Earth-kin weapons to Iivari
'You give heart to the Earth-kin, to return these to us. Thank you, small creature. We are allies.'
The stolen weapons may be found on hostile Rauta-lehmä Earth-kin in Nan Amlug, east of Rusfold.\n\nYou should recover stolen weapons from the hostile Earth-kin, and return them to Iivari at Rusfold.
